metadata.title: Friday, 28th November, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Tourism and Art what measures the Government has taken to stop illegal mining in national parks.
Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    whether the land earmarked for development in Katima Mulilo area in Sesheke District has been surveyed;
(b)    if so, when allocation of the plots to the developers will commence; and

(c)    whether the Government has any plans to service the plots prior to allocating them to the developers. PRESENTATION OF GOVERNMENT BILL The Minister of Finance The Zambia Revenue Authority (Amendment) - Bill to amend the Zambia Revenue Authority Act                                         (N.A.B. 7/2014) NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY The Minister of Finance Ways and Means:  That the House do now resolve into Committee of Ways and Means to consider the raising of supply. 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate. Heads 45/01, 45/02, 45/03, 45/05, 45/06, 45/07, 45/10, 45/11, 45/12, 45/13, 45/14, 45/15, 45/16, 45/17, 45/18, 45/19, 46/01, 46/02, 46/05, 46/07, 46/08, 46/09, 46/10, 46/11, 46/12, 46/13, 46/14, 46/15, 46/16, 46/17, 46/18, 46/19 and 78/01 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 45    -    Ministry of Community Development, Mother and Child Health Head 46    -    Ministry of Health Head 78    -    Zambia Security Intelligence Services – Office of the President
